content.text: My name is Amanda, nice to meet you.
Nice to meet you too, I'm Josh.
What do you do for work?
I'm trying to open my own grocery store.
How fun! What's the name of it going to be?
Not sure yet, I'm still in the early stages of planning.
That's a lot of work. I'm a server, I'm not much of a creative person.
I'm sure you're creative in your own way! My parents are both creative, I get it from them.
My mom is a ballet teacher and my dad is a carpenter.
Wow, that's great! I love ballet, I always wanted to take lessons.
You should! It's so much fun. I have four daughters, they all take ballet.
That's amazing! I'm sure they love it.
Yeah, they do. I hope to travel the world one day, but I don't know when that will happen.
That would be so much fun! I've been to a few concerts this year, I love live music.
I've never been to a concert, but I'd love to go.
You should! It's a great experience.
I'm going to have to check out some concerts, maybe I can find one that's coming to town.
